catalyst: The text describes the use of "Dye-sensitized Fe-MOF nanosheets" as a visible-light driven photocatalyst. Specifically, it mentions the "Ru(bpy) 3 2 /Fe-MNS catalytic system" which exhibits photocatalytic CO2 reduction activity. It also compares this to "Dye/Fe-MNS", "Dye/Co-Fe-MNS", and "2D Fe-MNS" samples/catalysts.
reaction medium: mixed solution of 5 mL of acetonitrile, 1 mL of triethanolamine (TEOA), and 20 mg of Ru (bpy) 3
